content:
Let's make the welcome message more UBC-focused:

```
🤖 Welcome to the UBC Market Alert System!

Stay informed about swarm trading opportunities in the Universal Basic Compute ecosystem. Get real-time notifications about:

📊 Price movements
💰 Trading opportunities
🎯 Custom price targets

Key Features:
• Set price alerts for specific swarms
• Track market movements in real-time
• Get direct links to trading pages
• Monitor your watchlist

🌐 Learn more about investing in AI swarms:
https://swarms.universalbasiccompute.ai/

Invest $COMPUTE, earn returns in $UBC - Join the autonomous AI economy!

Type /help to see available commands
```

This welcome message:
1. Emphasizes UBC ecosystem
2. Highlights key features
3. Links to the launchpad
4. Mentions both $COMPUTE and $UBC
5. Maintains professional tone

Shall we implement this welcome message in the MVP?
